channel.title: Player rights on a 525
channel.description: title says it all my friend said that theres more than just mod and admin but im used to 508s so thanks

item.title: Player rights on a 525
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Well you can assign new rights.

By default, there are only three rights, player (0), moderator (1), and administrator (2).

Declare

public int Owner;

public String playerRights() { if (Owner >= 1) { return "Owner"; } }

Ok now if you wanted a command for owners only

if (cmd[0].equals("promote")) { int name = substring[8]; if (playerRights().equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")) { try { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { playerRights++; } } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Use ::promote name"); } } }

Or to assign owner

Owner = 1;

Or to use in a message

sendMessage(""+playerName+" is a(n) "+playerRights()+".");

Hope that helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Player rights on a 525
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

playerrights = 1 = mod playerrights = 2 = admin playerrights = 3 = owner/co/coder
